revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = AirPea TV Android HDMI Stick |caption2 = ''AirPea Mini Cloud Dongle (AP1000)'' |pp = http://www.ippea.com |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = iPPea |model = AirPea TV Stick |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = (AP1000) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = computer-on-a-stick, media streamer, media player |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = O66-IP10 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Ingenic;JZ4770; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS32 |cpu1_type_rev = r2 |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 1 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 2 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5PS1G63EFR-S6C; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->

|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 0.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI out, microSD Card slot |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/30/2012 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00FZJF7PE |asin_country = DE |asin2 = B01AONK7VY |asin_country2 = JP |countrymanuf = China

|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;; |rad1chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad1chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The wireless chip used in this device appears to be a ''[[Broadcom]]'' chip. :The processor is not identifiable (except for the manuf.), :but it [http://www.cnx-software.com/2012/07/10/ippea-tv-android-4-0-3-hdmi-stick-based-on-ingenic-jz4770-mips-sells-for-50-usd/ appears to be the JZ4770] ([http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ingenic_Semiconductor see also Wikipedia]).
There is an '''ITE''' HDMI chip on-board. :There is also a [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/USB_On-The-Go USB OTG] (Micro-B) port on-board.
Devices may vary in NAND flash quantity ([http://www.ippea.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/07/iPPea-TV-sepc-2012.jpg 2GB] vs [http://www.ippea.com/ippea-tv-upgade-4gb-price-unchanged 4GB]).
:See also [[Vogue Media Player]] ([http://wl500g.info/showthread.php?22222-LCD-(OLED-amp-TFT)-%EC%EE%ED%E8%F2%EE%F0-%E4%EB%FF-%F0%EE%F3%F2%E5%F0%E0-Asus&langid=3&p=234959#post234959 On '''wl500g.info''' forums])
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery caption="from iPPea" mode="slideshow"> File:IPPea_TV.jpg|spec. leaflet </gallery></center>[[Has images::external| ]]
